tool_description: Updates prices across specified sales channels with new pricing data, handling channel-specific formatting and API requirements.

target_channels.description: Channels where prices should be updated

effective_date.description: When price changes should take effect (ISO 8601 format)

update_mode.description: Update timing: immediate, scheduled, or batch

validation_required.description: Whether to validate prices before updating

rollback_on_failure.description: Whether to rollback changes if any update fails

error_messages: Array length mismatch: product_ids, new_prices, and target_channels arrays must align.
Invalid update mode: Use immediate, scheduled, or batch.
Channel update failed: One or more channels rejected the price update.
Validation failed: Prices failed validation checks before update.
Rollback failed: Unable to revert price changes after partial failure.
usage: Provide product_ids, new_prices, and target_channels. Configure update_mode and validation options as needed for your update strategy.
